text: Krzysztof Bizacki (born April 7, 1973 in Tychy) is a former Polish footballer. ==Career== Bizacki began his career in the 1990/91 season, where he played for GKS Tychy. He moved to Ruch Chorzów during the following season. His most notable moments include his participation for the team in the Intertoto Cup in 1998. He has played more than 300 games for Ruch, scoring more than eighty goals. ==References== Category:People from Tychy Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:Polish footballers Category:Poland international footballers Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:Ruch Chorzów players Category:Odra Wodzisław players Category:GKS Tychy players Category:Sportspeople from Silesian Voivodeship Category:Association football forwards
title: Krzysztof Bizacki
